article_title: Joseph And The Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat Coming To Sioux Falls
article_text:
Sioux Falls, SD

A classic musical is coming to Sioux Falls this month.

Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat will hit the Mary W. Sommervold stage at the Washington Pavilion October 29-31.

The musical is a collaboration from Andrew Lloyd Webber and Tim Rice that tells the biblical story of Joseph and his brothers.

Tickets are on sale now. You can find them online, at the Washington Pavilion Box Office, or call (605)367-6000.
